mapper.select: select MEMBER_NUM as memberNum, MEMBER_NAME as memberName, MEMBER_ID as memberId, MEMBER_PASS as memberPass, MEMBER_TEL as memberTel, MEMBER_EMAIL as memberEmail, MEMBER_BIRTH as memberBirth, MEMBER_ADDRESS as memberAddress, MEMBER_AGREE as memberAgree, MEMBER_DATE as memberDate from members where MEMBER_ID=#{id}

SELECT T1.BASKET_NUM, T2.INTEREST_NUM, T1.OPTION_NUM, T1.MEMBER_NUM
FROM BASKETS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN INTERESTS T2 ON T1.MEMBER_NUM = T2.MEMBER_NUM WHERE T1.MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS ( MEMBER_NUM, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PASS, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_AGREE ) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(MEMBER_NUM),0)+1 FROM MEMBERS), -- MEMBER_NUM #{memberName}, -- #{memberId}, #{memberPass}, #{memberTel}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberAddress}, 'Y' -- MEMBER_AGREE )
